timeline.bodyText: If there's a typescriptier or more concise way to do this, let me know. I gather there is a preference for immutables (and don't know the syntax for pushing all elements onto an existing object anyways)
timeline.author: als364

replies.bodyText: how about passing the parameter notebookStyles to the style object sidebarContainer itself and return the height and top based on the parameter ? I think i might  be able to find an example in our code somewhere

replies.bodyText: Had an offline discussion, we do not have any examples now
replies.author: NehaBroad
